thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Eve DelSoldo, Associate General Counsel, QVC, Inc., Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle

author: cbs8
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Eve DelSoldo, Associate General Counsel, QVC, Inc., Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Eve DelSoldo selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Eve DelSoldo as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in law. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters.
“I’m pleased to welcome Eve into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones.” Her knowledge and experience in her industry are valuable assets to her company and community.”
After graduating with her Juris Doctor degree from Temple University - James E. Beasley School of Law, Eve DelSoldo began her career as an Associate at Schnader Harrison Segal & Lewis LLP. Eight years later, she became Partner at the firm and an accomplished industry leader in providing exceptional legal representation to her clients.
In August of 2010, Ms. DelSoldo took on the role of Associate General Counsel at QVC, Inc. , one of the world’s largest and most renowned multi-platform retail enterprises. Her primary focus is on monitoring information technology (IT) and e-commerce transactions, licensing and data security and privacy. In the five years since she has joined the company, she has effectively mastered the negotiation, acquisition and supervision of multimillion dollar IT transactions.
Beyond her successful career at QVC, Inc., Ms. DelSoldo is passionate about donating her time and support to charitable organizations, which include The Humane Society and LGBTQ marriage legalization organizations. For her fearless pursuit of professional and personal fulfillment, Ms. DelSoldo is an inspiration to the membership of NAPW.
Awards & Accomplishments: Doctor of Law, Temple University – James E. Beasley School of Law; Bachelor’s, Barnard College, Political Science
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/NAPW/PAQVCLawyer/prweb12938013.htm
